label: SPOT Excess Control
info:
Toto FLOW ma za ukol Å™Ã­dit pÅ™etoky podle spotu a vytvaÅ™et grafy spotu:
pÅ™Ã­klad vracenÃ½ch dat:

  "currentPrice": -0.06,
  "currentConsumptionNanoPrice": 0.29,
  "currentProductionWithNanoConsumptionPrice": -0.66,
  "currentProductionWithoutNanoConsumptionPrice": -0.96,
  "isCurrentlyCheapestHour": false,
  "isCurrentlySecondCheapestHour": false,
  "isCurrentlyThirdCheapestHour": false,
  "isCurrentlyFourthCheapestHour": false,
  "isCurrentlyFifthCheapestHour": false,
  "isCurrentlySixthCheapestHour": false,
  "isCurrentlyInTwoCheapestHours": false,
  "isCurrentlyInThreeCheapestHours": false,
  "isCurrentlyInFourCheapestHours": false,
  "isCurrentlyInFiveCheapestHours": false,
  "isCurrentlyInSixCheapestHours": false,
  "isCurrentlyInEightMostExpensiveHours": false,
  "isCurrentlyInTenMostExpensiveHours": false,
  "todayHourlyPrices": [1.15, 0.4, 0.13, 0.03, 0, 0.02, 0.02, 0.03, 0, -0.06, -0.2, -0.43, -0.61, -0.62, -0.31, -0.1, 0.13, 1.62, 2.33, 2.37, 2.14, 2.05, 1.43],
  "todayBaseCheapestHour": 14,
  "todayPeakCheapestHour": 14,
  "todayOffpeakCheapestHour": 5,
  "todayBaseSecondCheapestHour": 13,
  "todayPeakSecondCheapestHour": 13,
  "todayOffpeakSecondCheapestHour": 6,
  "todayBaseThirdCheapestHour": 12,
  "todayPeakThirdCheapestHour": 12,
  "todayOffpeakThirdCheapestHour": 7,
  "todayBaseFourthCheapestHour": 15,
  "todayPeakFourthCheapestHour": 15,
  "todayOffpeakFourthCheapestHour": 4,
  "todayBaseFifthCheapestHour": 11,
  "todayPeakFifthCheapestHour": 11,
  "todayOffpeakFifthCheapestHour": 8,
  "todayBaseSixthCheapestHour": 16,
  "todayPeakSixthCheapestHour": 16,
  "todayOffpeakSixthCheapestHour": 3
}
vysvÄ›tlenÃ­:

Tento objekt obsahuje informace o cenÃ¡ch elektÅ™iny a jejich analÃ½ze pro urÄitÃ½ den. Zde je popis jednotlivÃ½ch poloÅ¾ek a jejich vÃ½znam:

currentPrice: AktuÃ¡lnÃ­ cena elektÅ™iny v danou chvÃ­li. V tomto pÅ™Ã­padÄ› je cena zÃ¡pornÃ¡ (-0.06), coÅ¾ znamenÃ¡, Å¾e spotÅ™ebitelÃ© jsou zaplaceni za spotÅ™ebu elektÅ™iny (napÅ™Ã­klad v dÅ¯sledku pÅ™ebytku energie v sÃ­ti).

currentConsumptionNanoPrice: AktuÃ¡lnÃ­ cena spotÅ™eby elektÅ™iny vÄetnÄ› nanospotÅ™eby. NanospotÅ™eba mÅ¯Å¾e bÃ½t poplatek za pÅ™ipojenÃ­ k sÃ­ti nebo jinÃ© fixnÃ­ nÃ¡klady.

currentProductionWithNanoConsumptionPrice: AktuÃ¡lnÃ­ cena za vyrobenou energii, pokud je zapoÄÃ­tÃ¡na nanospotÅ™eba. ZÃ¡pornÃ¡ hodnota (-0.66) naznaÄuje, Å¾e vÃ½robce energie je zaplacen za vyrobenou energii.

currentProductionWithoutNanoConsumptionPrice: AktuÃ¡lnÃ­ cena za vyrobenou energii bez zapoÄÃ­tÃ¡nÃ­ nanospotÅ™eby. ZÃ¡pornÃ¡ hodnota (-0.96) opÄ›t naznaÄuje, Å¾e vÃ½robce je zaplacen za energii.

isCurrentlyCheapestHour a dalÅ¡Ã­ podobnÃ© promÄ›nnÃ© (isCurrentlySecondCheapestHour atd.): Tyto boolean hodnoty (true/false) urÄujÃ­, zda je aktuÃ¡lnÃ­ hodina nejlevnÄ›jÅ¡Ã­, druhou nejlevnÄ›jÅ¡Ã­ atd. v rÃ¡mci dne.

isCurrentlyInTwoCheapestHours a dalÅ¡Ã­ podobnÃ© promÄ›nnÃ©: Tyto boolean hodnoty urÄujÃ­, zda aktuÃ¡lnÃ­ hodina patÅ™Ã­ mezi dvÄ› nejlevnÄ›jÅ¡Ã­ hodiny dne, mezi tÅ™i nejlevnÄ›jÅ¡Ã­ hodiny dne atd.

isCurrentlyInEightMostExpensiveHours a isCurrentlyInTenMostExpensiveHours: Tyto boolean hodnoty urÄujÃ­, zda aktuÃ¡lnÃ­ hodina patÅ™Ã­ mezi osm nebo deset nejdraÅ¾Å¡Ã­ch hodin dne.

todayHourlyPrices: Pole obsahujÃ­cÃ­ ceny elektÅ™iny pro kaÅ¾dou hodinu dne. Ceny jsou uvedeny v poÅ™adÃ­ od 0 (pÅ¯lnoc) do 23 (23:00). ZÃ¡pornÃ© ceny znamenajÃ­, Å¾e spotÅ™ebitelÃ© jsou zaplaceni za spotÅ™ebu.

todayBaseCheapestHour, todayPeakCheapestHour, todayOffpeakCheapestHour a dalÅ¡Ã­ podobnÃ© promÄ›nnÃ©: Tyto hodnoty urÄujÃ­, kterÃ¡ hodina je nejlevnÄ›jÅ¡Ã­, druhÃ¡ nejlevnÄ›jÅ¡Ã­ atd. pro zÃ¡kladnÃ­, Å¡piÄkovÃ© a mimoÅ¡piÄkovÃ© obdobÃ­.

// Debugging flag
const debug = false;  // Nastavte na true pro zapnutÃ­ debug zprÃ¡v

/*

CREATE TABLE energy_data (
    date DATE,                           -- Datum zÃ¡znamu
    grid_input_L1_Wh FLOAT,             -- Grid vstup L1 (Wh)
    grid_output_L1_Wh FLOAT,            -- Grid vÃ½stup L1 (Wh)
    grid_input_L2_Wh FLOAT,             -- Grid vstup L2 (Wh)
    grid_output_L2_Wh FLOAT,            -- Grid vÃ½stup L2 (Wh)
    grid_input_L3_Wh FLOAT,             -- Grid vstup L3 (Wh)
    grid_output_L3_Wh FLOAT,            -- Grid vÃ½stup L3 (Wh)
    output_L1_Wh FLOAT,                -- VÃ½stup L1 (Wh)
    output_L2_Wh FLOAT,                -- VÃ½stup L2 (Wh)
    output_L3_Wh FLOAT,                -- VÃ½stup L3 (Wh)
    nBattery_input_Wh FLOAT,            -- Baterie vstup (Wh)
    nBattery_output_Wh FLOAT,           -- Baterie vÃ½stup (Wh)
    nBattery_State_Charge_min FLOAT,   -- MinimÃ¡lnÃ­ stav nabitÃ­ baterie (%)
    nBattery_State_Charge_max FLOAT,   -- MaximÃ¡lnÃ­ stav nabitÃ­ baterie (%)
    total_consumption FLOAT,            -- CelkovÃ¡ spotÅ™eba (kWh)
    vrm_consumption_fc FLOAT,          -- VRM spotÅ™eba (kWh)
    total_solar_yield FLOAT,           -- CelkovÃ½ solÃ¡rnÃ­ vÃ½nos (kWh)
    solar_yield_forecast FLOAT,         -- PÅ™edpovÄ›Ä solÃ¡rnÃ­ho vÃ½nosu (kWh)
    average_spot_price FLOAT           -- PrÅ¯mÄ›rnÃ¡ cena spotu
);



INSERT INTO energy_data (
    date,
    grid_input_L1_Wh,
    grid_output_L1_Wh,
    grid_input_L2_Wh,
    grid_output_L2_Wh,
    grid_input_L3_Wh,
    grid_output_L3_Wh,
    output_L1_Wh,
    output_L2_Wh,
    output_L3_Wh,
    nBattery_input_Wh,
    nBattery_output_Wh,
    nBattery_State_Charge_min,
    nBattery_State_Charge_max,
    total_consumption,
    vrm_consumption_fc,
    total_solar_yield,
    solar_yield_forecast,
    average_spot_price
) VALUES (
    '2024-10-01', -- PÅ™Ã­klad datumu
    grid_input_L1_Wh,
    grid_output_L1_Wh,
    grid_input_L2_Wh,
    grid_output_L2_Wh,
    grid_input_L3_Wh,
    grid_output_L3_Wh,
    output_L1_Wh,
    output_L2_Wh,
    output_L3_Wh,
    nBattery_input_Wh,
    nBattery_output_Wh,
    nBattery_State_Charge_min,
    nBattery_State_Charge_max,
    total_consumption,
    vrm_consumption_fc,
    total_solar_yield,
    solar_yield_forecast,
    average_spot_price
);

<style>
    body {
        --margin: 0;
        --padding: 0;
        --font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        --background-color: #3c3c3c;    // pozadi v kartach amererach
        --background: #2e2d2d;          // pozadi pod LABELem
        --color: #faf9f5;
        --barva-textu: #cccbc8;         //barva textu 
        --color_border: #004f4b;
        --on-background: #4790d0;
        --on-surface: #faf9f5;
        --on-primary: #faf9f5;
        --surface: #373737;
        --okraj-karty: #504f4b;         //barva okraje karty
        --primary: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetColor);
        --secondary: var(--nr-dashboard-groupTextColor);
        --accent: red;
        --radius-s: 9px;                //hodnota zakulaceni okraju, pokud je funkce povolene
        //--nr-dashboard-widgetTextColor: var(--on-primary);
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: var(--background-color);
        color: var(--barva-textu);
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme {
        background-color: var(--background);
        font-family: var(--font-family);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template {
        background-color: var(--surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
        background-color: var(--background);
        border: 2px solid var(--okraj-karty);      //nastaveni okraje karet
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background-color: var(--primary);
        line-height: inherit;
        color: var(--on-primary);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme [ui-card-size="2x2"].nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        white-space: pre-line;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button ui-icon {
        margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
        background-color: var(--secondary);
    }

    md-card.md-default-theme,
    md-card {
        //border-radius: 0; /* ZakulacenÃ­ rohÅ¯ odstranÄ›no */
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-gauge-titlel {
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-l) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-l);
        text-transform: capitalize;
        color: var(--on-background);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardpanel>p {
        margin-left: 0;
        padding-left: 8px; /* ZmenÅ¡enÃ¡ vÃ½plÅˆ */
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
        background-color: var(--surface);
    }

    /* Calendar and Date picker */
    .md-default-theme .md-datepicker-calendar,
    .md-datepicker-calendar,
    .md-default-theme .md-calendar,
    .md-calendar {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .md-default-theme .md-datepicker-calendar-pane,
    .md-datepicker-calendar-pane {
        border: 0;
    }

    .md-default-theme .md-calendar-month-label md-icon,
    .md-calendar-month-label md-icon,
    .md-default-theme .md-datepicker-input,
    .md-datepicker-input {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker md-input-container .md-input {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-textinput md-input-container .md-input,
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-input-container.md-default-theme .md-input,
    md-input-container .md-input {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-textinput md-input-container.md-input-has-value label {
        color: #5d5e5f;
    }

    /* Dropdown */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value,
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value.md-select-placeholder {
        color: var(--on-surface);
        //border-color: #1d85fc;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown .md-select-icon {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu,
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var (--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
        color: #1bbfff !important;
        background-color: var(--surface) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-menu-content {
        background-color: #ffffff;
        color: #111111;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-menu-content md-menu-item {
        background-color: #ffffff;
        color: #111111;
    }

    /* Date picker */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker md-input-container .md-input {
        color: var(--on-surface);
        //border-color: #1d85fc;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker .md-datepicker-triangle-button .md-datepicker-expand-triangle {
        border-top-color: #1d85fc;
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        background-color: var(--surface);
    }

    md-list-item._md-button-wrap>div.md-button:first-child,
    md-list-item .md-list-item-inner {
        background-color: var(--surface);
    }

    /* Chart */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-chart-title {
        color: var(--on-surface);
        //border-color: #1d85fc;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-chart-container {
        color: var(--on-surface);
        //border-color: #1d85fc;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-chart {
        color: var(--on-surface);
        //border-color: #1d85fc;
    }

    /* KulatÄ›nÃ­ rohÅ¯ */
    .Kulati_Nahore {
       // border-top-left-radius: var(--radius-s);
       // border-top-right-radius: var(--radius-s);
    }

    .Kulati_Dole {
       // border-bottom-left-radius: var(--radius-s);
       // border-bottom-right-radius: var(--radius-s);
    }

    /* ZmenÅ¡enÃ­ mezer mezi prvky */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-text {
        margin-bottom: 5px; /* ZmenÅ¡enÃ­ spodnÃ­ho okraje mezi texty */
    }

    /* ZmenÅ¡enÃ­ okrajÅ¯ a vÃ½plnÃ­ karet */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-cardpanel {

name: Dashboard Theme : HaCeSOFT
format:
<style>
    :root {
        --accent: red;
        --background-color: #3c3c3c;            /* pozadi v kartach a mezerach */
        --background: #2e2d2d;                  /* pozadi pod LABELem */
        --barva-textu: #cccbc8;                 /* barva textu */
        --color_border: #004f4b;
        --color_pozadi_switche_on: #bc981f;     /* barva pozadi posuvneho prepinace, aktivni stav */
        --color_pozadi_switche_off: #bc981f;    /* barva pozadi posuvneho prepinace, neaktivni stav */
        --color_switche_on: green;              /* barva zapnuteho prepinace */
        --color_switche_off: #cc6a00;           /* barva vypnuteho prepinace */
        --color_sub_menu: grey;                 /* barva submenu nakarte REAL DAT, SPOT atd */
        --color_ind_on: #32cd32;                /*barva indicator fan zalena - on */
        --color_ind_off: grey;                  /*barva indicator fan seda - OFF */
        --font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        --margin: 0;
        --menu-background: #ffffff;
        --menu-color: #111111;
        --okraj-karty: #504f4b;                 /* barva okraje karty */
        --on-background: #4790d0;
        --on-primary: #faf9f5;
        --on-surface: #faf9f5;
        --padding: 0;
        --primary: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetColor);
        --radius-s: 9px;                        /* hodnota zakulaceni okraju, pokud je funkce povolene */
        --secondary: var(--nr-dashboard-groupTextColor);
        --surface: #373737;                     //zahlavi a pozadi zmenovych inputu se sipkama nahotu a dolu
        --inputs: red;                          //zahlavi a pozadi zmenovych inputu se sipkama nahotu a dolu
        /* dalÅ¡Ã­ promÄ›nnÃ© dle potÅ™eby */
    }

    body {
        background-color: var(--background-color);
        color: var(--barva-textu);
        font-family: var(--font-family);
        margin: var(--margin);
        padding: var(--padding);
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme {
        background-color: var(--background);
        font-family: var(--font-family);
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: var(--background-color);
        color: var(--barva-textu);
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        background-color: var(--surface);
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
        background-color: var(--surface);
    }

    /* Calendar and Date picker */
    .md-calendar,
    .md-datepicker-calendar,
    .md-default-theme .md-calendar,
    .md-default-theme .md-datepicker-calendar {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .md-datepicker-calendar-pane,
    .md-default-theme .md-datepicker-calendar-pane {
        border: 0;
    }

    .md-datepicker-input,
    .md-default-theme .md-datepicker-input,
    .md-default-theme .md-calendar-month-label md-icon,
    .md-datepicker-calendar-pane,
    .md-default-theme .md-calendar-month-label md-icon {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    md-card,
    md-card.md-default-theme {
        border-radius: 0;
        /* ZakulacenÃ­ rohÅ¯ odstranÄ›no */
    }

    md-list-item .md-list-item-inner,
    md-list-item._md-button-wrap>div.md-button:first-child {
        background-color: var(--inputs);
    }


    .nr-dashboard-template {
        padding: var(--padding); 
    }

    /* Chart */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-chart {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    color: var(--color_sub_menu); 
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-chart-container {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-chart-title {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    /* Dropdown */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown .md-select-icon {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch.md-checked .md-bar {/* aktivni stav - pozadi prepinace */
        background-color: var(--color_pozadi_switche_on);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch .md-bar {/*neaktivni stav - pozadi prepinace */
        background-color: var(--color_pozadi_switche_off);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch.md-checked .md-thumb {/* aktivni stav - barva pÅ™epinace */
        background-color: var(--color_switche_on);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch .md-thumb {/*neaktivni stav - barva prepinace */
        background-color: var(--color_switche_off);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value,
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value.md-select-placeholder {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu,
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
        background-color: var(--surface) !important;
        color: #1bbfff !important;
    }

    /* Date picker */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker md-input-container .md-input {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker .md-datepicker-triangle-button .md-datepicker-expand-triangle {
        border-top-color: #1d85fc;
    }

    /* ZmenÅ¡enÃ­ mezer mezi prvky */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-text {
        margin-bottom: 5px;
        /* ZmenÅ¡enÃ­ spodnÃ­ho okraje mezi texty */
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background-color: var(--primary);
        color: var(--on-primary);
        line-height: inherit;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
        background-color: var(--secondary);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button ui-icon {
        margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme [ui-card-size="2x2"].nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        align-items: center;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        white-space: pre-line;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-cardpanel {
        margin: var(--margin);
        padding: var(--padding);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker md-input-container .md-input {
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-gauge-titlel {
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-l) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template {
        background-color: var(--surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-textinput md-input-container.md-input-has-value label {
        color: #5d5e5f;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu {
        background-color: var(--surface);
        color: var(--on-surface);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-menu-content {
        background-color: var(--menu-background);
        color: var(--menu-color);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-menu-content md-menu-item {
        background-color: var(--menu-background);
        color: var(--menu-color);
    }

    /* KulatÄ›nÃ­ rohÅ¯ */
    .Kulati_Dole {
     //   border-bottom-left-radius: var(--radius-s);
     //   border-bottom-right-radius: var(--radius-s);
    }

    .Kulati_Nahore {
     //   border-top-left-radius: var(--radius-s);
     //   border-top-right-radius: var(--radius-s);
    }

    .label_small{
        color: #aaaaaa;
        font-size: 13px;
    }

    .label_size15{
    color: #aaaaaa;
    font-size: 15px;
    }

    .red{
    color: #ff5656;
    }

    .yellow{
    color: yellow;
    }

    .green{
    color: #0b9e0b;
    }

    .label_small_nc{
        font-size: 13px;
    }
</style>
info:
# Modern Dark Theme for node-red-dashboard

Inspired by Victor Lucachi with his [Node Red Dashboard Concept](https://dribbble.com/shots/10356530-Node-Red-Dashboard-Concept) on Dribbble. Thank you for your work.

## Customize

1. Go on dashboard customisation tab (At the right of Debug Console).
2. Select the style `Dark`.
3. Pick the color you want. Example `#66B5F8`

## Buttons

Use `2x2` size for buttons with icon and text on the screenshot
